title: The Network Society
description: "In The Network Society, Darin Barney provides an examination of the social, political and economic implications of network technologies and their application across a wide range of practices and institutions." "Using a sophisticated model of the relationship between technology and society, Barney investigates both what has changed, and what has remained the same, in the age of the internet." "This book will be essential reading for students of sociology, politics and the media."--Résumé de l'éditeur.
